long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find your Qibla direction with the help of online maps! This extension automatically uses the location permission provided to Chrome extensions and gets your lat and lng information. It then marks your location on the map with a compass and draws a line between you and the Kaaba. This allows you to accurately locate the qibla before you pray.
